Package com.github.checkit.service

Class BaseRepositoryService<T extends HasIdentifier>

java.lang.Object
com.github.checkit.service.BaseRepositoryService<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Domain object type managed by this service
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommentService, GestoringRequestService, ChangeService, NotificationService, ProjectContextService, PublicationContextService, UserService, VocabularyContextService, VocabularyService
public abstract class BaseRepositoryService<T extends HasIdentifier> extends Object
Base implementation of repository services.

It contains the basic transactional CRUD operations. Subclasses are expected to provide DAO of the correct type, which is used by the CRUD methods implemented by this base class.

In order to minimize chances of messing up the transactional behavior, subclasses *should not* override the main CRUD methods and instead should provide custom business logic by overriding the helper hooks such as prePersist(HasIdentifier).

    • getPrimaryDao

      Gets primary DAO which is used to implement the CRUD methods in this service.
      Returns:
      Data access object

    • findAll

      public List<T> findAll()
      Loads all instances of the type managed by this service from the repository.
      Returns:
      List of all matching instances

    • find

      public Optional<T> find(URI id)
      Finds an object with the specified id and returns it.
      Parameters:
      id - Identifier of the object to load
      Returns:
      Optional with the loaded object or an empty one
      See Also:
      • findRequired(URI)

    • getReference

      public Optional<T> getReference(URI id)
      Gets a reference to an object wih the specified identifier.

      Note that all attributes of the reference are loaded lazily and the corresponding persistence context must be still open to load them.

      Also note that, in contrast to find(URI), this method does not invoke postLoad(HasIdentifier) for the loaded instance.

      Parameters:
      id - Identifier of the object to load
      Returns:
      Optional with the loaded reference or an empty one

    • findRequired

      public T findRequired(URI id)
      Finds an object with the specified id and returns it.

      In comparison to find(URI), this method guarantees to return a matching instance. If no such object is found, a NotFoundException is thrown.

      Parameters:
      id - Identifier of the object to load
      Returns:
      The matching object
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If no matching instance is found
      See Also:
      • find(URI)

    • getRequiredReference

      public T getRequiredReference(URI id)
      Gets a reference to an object wih the specified identifier.

      In comparison to getReference(URI), this method guarantees to return a matching instance. If no such object is found, a NotFoundException is thrown.

      Note that all attributes of the reference are loaded lazily and the corresponding persistence context must be still open to load them.

      Also note that, in contrast to find(URI), this method does not invoke postLoad(HasIdentifier) for the loaded instance.

      Parameters:
      id - Identifier of the object to load
      Returns:
      Optional with the loaded reference or an empty one

    • postLoad

      protected T postLoad(@NonNull T instance)
      Override this method to plug custom behavior into find(URI) or findAll().
      Parameters:
      instance - The loaded instance, not null

    • update

      Merges the specified updated instance into the repository.
      Parameters:
      instance - The instance to merge
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the entity does not exist in the repository

    • preUpdate

      protected void preUpdate(@NonNull T instance)
      Override this method to plug custom behavior into the transactional cycle of update(HasIdentifier) )}.

      The default behavior is to ensure its existence in the repository.

      Parameters:
      instance - The instance to be updated, not null

    • postUpdate

      protected void postUpdate(@NonNull T instance)
      Override this method to plug custom behavior into the transactional cycle of update(HasIdentifier) )}.
      Parameters:
      instance - The updated instance which will be returned by update(HasIdentifier) )}, not null

    • remove

      @Transactional public void remove(T instance)
      Removes the specified instance from the repository.
      Parameters:
      instance - The instance to remove

    • preRemove

      protected void preRemove(@NonNull T instance)
      Override this method to plug custom behavior into the transactional cycle of remove(HasIdentifier).

      The default behavior is a no-op.

      Parameters:
      instance - The instance to be removed, not null

    • postRemove

      protected void postRemove(@NonNull T instance)
      Override this method to plug custom behavior into the transactional cycle of remove(HasIdentifier).

      The default behavior is a no-op.

      Parameters:
      instance - The removed instance, not null

    • exists

      public boolean exists(URI id)
      Checks whether an instance with the specified identifier exists in the repository.
      Parameters:
      id - ID to check
      Returns:
      true if the instance exists, false otherwise
